alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:50AM EDT until July 29 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EDT FOR DARKE COUNTY... At 350 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Union City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Versailles, Bradford, Union City, Ansonia, Webster, Gettysburg, Osgood, North Star, Rossburg, New Weston, Yorkshire, Union Corners, Darke County Airport, Rose Hill, Eldora Speedway, Willowdell, Sharps Crossing and Horatio. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
